CustomField.description: Business Units based on Product category on quote
CustomField.formula: IF ( Count_CRC_Quote_Lines__c > 0, "Aluminum Conduit Fittings, ", "" )& IF ( Count_AFC_Quote_Lines__c > 0, "ECFC, ", "" )& IF ( Count_ALFITT_Quote_Lines__c > 0, "Conduit and Cable Fittings, ", "" )& IF ( Count_ECN_Quote_Lines__c > 0, "ECN, ", "" )& IF ( Count_Metal_Framing_Quote_Lines__c > 0, "Metal Framing, ", "" )& IF ( Count_PVCCON_Quote_Lines__c > 0, "PVC Conduit, ", "" )& IF ( Count_PVCFIT_Quote_Lines__c > 0, "PVC Fittings, ", "" )& IF ( Count_PVCWPIPE_Quote_Lines__c > 0, "PVC Water Pipe, ", "" )& IF ( Count_Steel_Conduit_Quote_Lines__c > 0, "Steel Conduit, ", "" )
CustomField.label: Business Unit (Long)
